Lakewood.Allen Tire Company:
Allen Tire Company a tire and wheel retailer in Southern California, USA, established in 1973, with 18 locations throughout Southern California. Modern Tire Dealer publishes lists of the top 100 independent tire store chains; Allen appeared around 50th place during the first decade of the twentyfirst century.


== Locations ==
As of 2017 the company had locations in Anaheim, Costa Mesa, Downey, Fullerton, Fountain Valley, Hemet, Huntington Beach, Lake Forest, Lakewood, Mission Viejo, Palm Springs, two in Riverside, two in Santa Ana, Torrance, Westminster and Yorba Linda.
